security_issues.message:
Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-autoscaling-enable-at-rest-encryption
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: VPC does not have VPC Flow Logs enabled.
Link: [aws-autoscaling-enable-at-rest-encryption](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-autoscaling-enable-at-rest-encryption)

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl
Severity: MEDIUM
Message: Network ACL rule allows unrestricted ingress from any IP address.
Link: [aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-vpc-no-public-ingress-acl)

Artifact: main.tf
Type: terraform
Vulnerability aws-vpc-no-excessive-port-access
Severity: CRITICAL
Message: Network ACL rule allows access using ALL ports.
Link: [aws-vpc-no-excessive-port-access](https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/aws-vpc-no-excessive-port-access)

Artifact: main.tf
